samples.question: Do you prefer to go shopping in the shopping mall or on the street market?

samples.question: How has your mobile phone changed your life?
samples.transcript: My mobile phone has changed my life in both ways that is positive and negative. >> In positive way, it helped me connect with my family's friend. It helped me communicate with others. >> On the other hand, it occupied me. It disturbed my schedule. >> Mhm. >> Due to calls, emails, etc. >> Okay.

samples.question: So here he could give yes why not?
samples.transcript: So there are many reasons why water sports will become more popular in the future. Firstly, I would think that awareness because the awareness is increasing. Thirdly the young generation they are highly influenced by the social media. And fourth last but not least you could use here adventure in nature. Today's youngsters they are more creative and they are more adventurous in nature and they love to do something different something more adventurous. samples.question: [Transcript chunk 2]
samples.transcript: Pants shirts and shoes mobile phones and watches as a gift okay current now few questions will be based on area you live in do you like the area you live in yes definitely I love the area where I living nowadays because there are plethora of amenities which are available like good hospitals good education system and a good transport system okay what are some changes in the area recently well there are only two changes are happening in my area and that is are a new government school and government hospital is open recently so these two places are opened in your area yes ma'am okay do you know any famous people in your do you know any famous person or any famous personality in your area yes definitely there is a boy and he is only 20 year old and he won the cdy match on the national level and he is very famous in my area okay can you name him actually I do not remember the exact exact name of his and I his name is I think hardip Singh okay will you live in this area in future yes definitely I will live there in my future because after completing my father education in abroad and I will definitely come come back and then I will open my own business in my area okay thank you so much thank you.
